statements: DELETE FROM weather_forecasts WHERE is_raining = TRUE;
DELETE FROM weather_forecasts WHERE is_raining = TRUE AND forecast_date < '2022-10-16';
DELETE FROM CloudCoverData WHERE date = '2022-06-30' AND cloud_coverage > 0.75
DELETE FROM ForecastAccuracy WHERE forecasted_weather = 'Sunny' AND accuracy_score < 0.9
DELETE FROM CloudCoverData WHERE location = 'New York' AND cloud_coverage < 0.5;
DELETE FROM UserFeedback WHERE rating > 4 AND feedback LIKE '%excellent%';
DELETE FROM weather_forecasts WHERE location = 'New York';
